list.name: Changes
list.comment: Merged MainLogic and display-player-color into main and resolved the conflicts.

task.summary:
Changes to major files: - Create child classes of Building abstract class - Create Action abstract and its action classes which are MoveAction, BuildAction and EndTurnAction. - Added BoardEventHandler for calling handleCellClick in logicManager. - Modified BoardGUI, Cell and Game classes - Added GameLogic and GameLogicManager classes for all the logic of the game. - Modified TurnManager to keep track of each turn.
What will be improved: - Building action and moving action to be done while running. - Prevent god classes if needed. - Apply god cards ability into the game for both players. - Define winning requirement in the game logic.

Major Changes #2: - Implemented the move action of workers. - The game log displays the status of the game and each action that the players make. - The game stores turns and players can undo the move action. - Still working in progress on the build action. - Commented the GameLogic and TurnManager classes. These classes will be in use as soon as possible for OOP design since the GameLogicManager handles most of the logic and is deemed to become a god class.
Merged display-godcard-image, movement-update and MainLogic into main: - Resolved the conflicts during merging. - Fixed all the occurring errors for change adaption.
Fixed error of image not displaying during card assignment to players.

Winning condition added: - Implemented the game with the winning requirement which is that the player having worker move to Level 3 building wins - Added the result screen to display the number of turns and winner information. - Re-implemented number of turns logic. - Place color objects in Main for player workers. - Added GameLog to display the game log messages. - Added PlayerUtils and ImageUtils to hold methods that are related to Players and Images. - Modified the main for more OOP design.
Merged move-and-build-update into main: - Fixed the logic of only the same selected worker can do both actions in one turn, not alternatively with the other worker of such Player.
GameScreen modification: - Added the use god card ability button called Use Effect
God card ability in-use: - The game can now apply god card usage. - It is not OOP in this stage because god cards have not been used perfectly in the logic.
Merged MainLogic and display-player-color into main and resolved the conflicts.

Changes to major files: - Create child classes of Building abstract class - Create Action abstract and its action classes which are MoveAction, BuildAction and EndTurnAction. - Added BoardEventHandler for calling handleCellClick in logicManager. - Modified BoardGUI, Cell and Game classes - Added GameLogic and GameLogicManager classes for all the logic of the game. - Modified TurnManager to keep track of each turn.
What will be improved: - Building action and moving action to be done while running. - Prevent god classes if needed. - Apply god cards ability into the game for both players. - Define winning requirement in the game logic.

Major Changes #2: - Implemented the move action of workers. - The game log displays the status of the game and each action that the players make. - The game stores turns and players can undo the move action. - Still working in progress on the build action. - Commented the GameLogic and TurnManager classes. These classes will be in use as soon as possible for OOP design since the GameLogicManager handles most of the logic and is deemed to become a god class.
Merged display-godcard-image, movement-update and MainLogic into main: - Resolved the conflicts during merging. - Fixed all the occurring errors for change adaption.
Fixed error of image not displaying during card assignment to players.

Winning condition added: - Implemented the game with the winning requirement which is that the player having worker move to Level 3 building wins - Added the result screen to display the number of turns and winner information. - Re-implemented number of turns logic. - Place color objects in Main for player workers. - Added GameLog to display the game log messages. - Added PlayerUtils and ImageUtils to hold methods that are related to Players and Images. - Modified the main for more OOP design.
Merged move-and-build-update into main: - Fixed the logic of only the same selected worker can do both actions in one turn, not alternatively with the other worker of such Player.
GameScreen modification: - Added the use god card ability button called Use Effect
God card ability in-use: - The game can now apply god card usage. - It is not OOP in this stage because god cards have not been used perfectly in the logic.
Merged MainLogic and display-player-color into main and resolved the conflicts.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Merged MainLogic and display-player-color into main and resolved the conflicts.
